in my opinion I think it is not a fun game. I say this due to the fact that bitches can one tap in the head with an ak-47, Deagle, awp etc. While some other gun do not do that. Aiming is weird as shit and makes absolutely no sense with the aiming mechanics displayed for you. Oh and the spray pattern as also a load of shit! Bullet will go straight to the moon and completely miss your target and you can be in there body, and lets not forget the no reg shots which is completely annoying. If you want to save your sanity and possibly your friendships and possibly relationships then please for the of all that is mighty stay away from this abomination and GO TOUCH SOME GRASS! thank you for the your time...
